Name: Lamp with Man's Head
Description: This lamp has a picture of the upper part of a man in the center. The man's head is turned to the left. The clothes and the head are portrayed in lines. On each side of the head are openings for oil. There is a tube connecting the middle of the lamp with the wick opening. On the sides there are laurel wreaths. The handle is solid and protruding a little. The wick opening is missing.
